page.title: 04The place where I live
page.content: The place where I live is Waun Wen. It has many houses and a big hill, but not enough shops, post boxes or phone booths. There are also not enough youth clubs or parks. There is not even a disco. There is a boxing club and judo but sometimes it gets a bit boring because there is nowhere to go. I would like to see more amenities for young people eg. a roller rink or ice rink, a park and a youth club where we could play snooker or badminton. There is plenty of space available but no-one seems to be interested in doing anything about it. There are two big disused quarries where people dump their rubbish. These could be cleaned up and used for the amenities we need.
